ygData.subject: Re: manuel attack
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried something similar before, by hot keying my melee attack. But this just activates the same way as auto-attack. Dont know if there is a way to get attack
ygData.messageBody:
I tried something similar before, by hot keying my melee attack. But
this just activates the same way as auto-attack.
Dont know if there is a way to get attack to work the same a bash,
etc..

Bathory
Cazic-Thule

--- "Steven E. Phipps" <phipps@...> wrote:
> How do I turn off autoattack and use attack as if it
> were slam or bash or kick??
> morgul
